snippet: Complaints about sexual misconduct at the service academies dramatize the need for reform.
abstract: Editorial contends complaints about sexual misconduct at American service academies underscore need for reform of the military justice system; calls on top military brass to explain in upcoming Senate hearing how not moving sexual assault cases outside of the chain of command will help to change military's entrenched culture of sexual misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Complaints about sexual misconduct at the service academies dramatize the need for reform.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
